data.description: OCP node could behave unexpectedly when it doesn't meet the minimum resource requirements
data.details:
Minimum resource requirements for Openshift 4 Nodes are not met, which could cause unexpected behavior.

[Knowledgebase Article](https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.1/installing/installing_bare_metal/installing-bare-metal.html#minimum-resource-requirements_installing-bare-metal)
